title: DOE-based process optimization for development of efficient methods for purification of recombinant hepatitis B surface antigen from Pichia pastoris feedstock using Capto adhere resin
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Maryam Moazami Goodarzi, Reza Jalalirad, Delaram Doroud, Hamidreza Hozouri, Mohammad Reza Aghasadeghi
